Production Co: Fils Prod, France 2 Cinéma, Les Films du Kiosque, Orange Studio, Umedia, Pathé Films, Hugar Prod
Synopsis: Victor, a disillusioned 60-something whose marriage is on the rocks, opts to relive the week of his life when, 40 years earlier, he met his true love through a company that allows its customers to return to the time period of their choosing.
Title: La belle époque
